body:
Hey guys, I'm sorry if this is considered spam. I'll archive it if desired.

Just want to let you guys know that we do have a Plug DJ community and I often go on there to play some music (mostly for myself, lol.) If you want to join, feel free! It's a lot of fun and it's great to share music. We also get points for liking each other's songs and we can buy new avatars and shtuffs.

plug.dj/avicus/

See you there! :)
Btw I'm on right now, lol.

title: Don't Forget About Plug DJ!
